text: Naxie ren [youtai jiaotu] hai shuo:“An la ceng gaojie women buke xiangxin renhe shizhe, chufei ta [cong tianshang] xiang women xianshi yige huo fen de gongwu.” Ni shuo:“Zai wo zhiqian, you xuduo shizhe que yi daizhe mingzheng he nimen suo qingqiu de [jixiang] daoda nimen. Weisheme nimen hai yao wangtu shahai tamen ne? Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
